Name: Wilton Martini
Ingredients: 30 ml Calvados / apple brandy / straight applejack
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Martini glass .
Prepare garnish of cinnamon dusted apple slice.
History: A 2003 adaptation of the signature cocktail at The Blue Bar, The Berkeley Hotel, London, England.
Nutrition: One serving of Wilton Martini contains 211 calories
